µC/Shell - Release Notes

Collapse all Expand all
Version 1.03.01

Release date : 2013-01-21

Requirements

  • µC/CPU V1.29.01
  • µC/LIB V1.37.00

New features & improvements

  • C++ compatibility: Improved C++ compatibility.

API Changes

  • Structure SHELL_MODULE_CMD fields Prev/NextModuleCmtPtr type has been changed from void* to SHELL_MODULE_CMD*.

Bug fixes

  • (SHELL-1) Fix character insertion mode at the terminal prompt
  • (SHELL-2) Terminal prompt should be in insert mode by default
Previous versions

See uC-Shell-ReleaseNotesArchive.pdf for previous version release notes.
